name: blockchain-wallet-v4
description: The frontend wallet application built with React/Redux.

scripts.analyze: lerna exec --scope blockchain-wallet-v4-frontend -- npm run analyze
scripts.build: lerna exec --scope blockchain-wallet-v4-frontend -- npm run build:dev
scripts.build:prod: lerna exec --scope blockchain-wallet-v4-frontend -- npm run build:prod
scripts.ci:compile: lerna exec --scope blockchain-wallet-v4-frontend -- npm run ci:compile
scripts.ci:coverage: lerna exec -- npm run test:build && lerna link && npm run coverage:components && npm run coverage:core && npm run coverage:frontend && istanbul report --root ./coverage --dir ./coverage/ lcov
scripts.ci:test: lerna exec -- npm run test:build && lerna link && npm run test:components && npm run test:core && npm run test:frontend
scripts.clean: cross-env rimraf node_modules && rimraf build && rimraf coverage && rimraf dist && rimraf *.log && rimraf *.lerna_backup && lerna clean --yes
scripts.coverage: cross-env rimraf coverage && lerna exec -- npm run coverage && istanbul report --root ./coverage --dir ./coverage/ text-summary html
scripts.coverage:components: lerna exec --scope blockchain-info-components -- npm run coverage
scripts.coverage:core: lerna exec --scope blockchain-wallet-v4 -- npm run coverage
scripts.coverage:frontend: lerna exec --scope blockchain-wallet-v4-frontend -- npm run coverage
scripts.start: lerna exec --scope blockchain-wallet-v4-frontend -- npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev: lerna exec --scope blockchain-wallet-v4-frontend -- npm run start:dev
scripts.start:prod: lerna exec --scope blockchain-wallet-v4-frontend -- npm run start:prod
scripts.start:staging: lerna exec --scope blockchain-wallet-v4-frontend -- npm run start:staging
scripts.start:testnet: lerna exec --scope blockchain-wallet-v4-frontend -- npm run start:testnet
scripts.storybook:build: lerna exec --scope blockchain-info-components -- npm run storybook:build
scripts.storybook:serve: lerna exec --scope blockchain-info-components -- npm run storybook:serve
scripts.test: cross-env  lerna exec -- npm run test:build && lerna link && lerna exec -- npm run test
scripts.test:components: lerna exec --scope blockchain-info-components -- npm run test
scripts.test:components:debug: lerna exec --scope blockchain-info-components -- npm run test:debug
scripts.test:components:update: lerna exec --scope blockchain-info-components -- npm run test -- -u
scripts.test:components:watch: lerna exec --scope blockchain-info-components -- npm run test:watch
scripts.test:core: lerna exec --scope blockchain-wallet-v4 -- npm run test
scripts.test:core:debug: lerna exec --scope blockchain-wallet-v4 -- npm run test:debug
scripts.test:core:watch: lerna exec --scope blockchain-wallet-v4 -- npm run test:watch
scripts.test:frontend: lerna exec --scope blockchain-wallet-v4-frontend -- npm run test
scripts.test:frontend:debug: lerna exec --scope blockchain-wallet-v4-frontend -- npm run test:debug
scripts.test:frontend:update: lerna exec --scope blockchain-wallet-v4-frontend -- npm run test -- -u
scripts.test:frontend:watch: lerna exec --scope blockchain-wallet-v4-frontend -- npm run test:watch
scripts.vet: cross-env npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.vet:components: cross-env npm run lint:components && npm run test:components
scripts.vet:core: cross-env npm run lint:core && npm run test:core
scripts.vet:frontend: cross-env npm run lint:frontend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.manage:translations: lerna exec --scope blockchain-wallet-v4-frontend -- npm run manage:translations
